field.name: mapWidth
field.label: Width of the events map, in pixel

field.name: mapHeight
field.label: Height of the events map, in pixel

field.name: zoom
field.label: Zoom of the events map. 0 means auto.

field.name: max_zoom
field.label: Maximum zoom of the map. The zoom won't be higher than this zoom level when the map is showing a single event

field.name: limit
field.label: Limit number of events that map will display
field.description: This will be applied even if map is adaptive.

field.name: @sp1
field.label:
This option control visibility inside Ohanah's views.
Map of all the events can be displayed on any page. Use this to hide it from certain views if needed (for example you can hide it from single event view and registration)

field.name: show_in_events_view
field.label: Show in events list view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the events list view

field.name: show_in_event_view
field.label: Show in event view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the event view

field.name: show_in_venue_view
field.label: Show in venue view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the venue view

field.name: show_in_category_view
field.label: Show in category view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the category view

field.name: show_in_registration_view
field.label: Show in event registration view
field.description: Select whether to show or hide this module in the event registration view
